Create a Floating Garden: Utilize the abundant sunlight and water from the ocean to grow a variety of plants and vegetables. Use a combination of hydroponics, aeroponics, and aquaponics to create a sustainable food source. This will not only provide sustenance but also add beauty to the island with colorful flowers and lush greenery.

Design a Solar-Powered Water Purification System: Harness the power of the sun to purify seawater into fresh drinking water. Develop a system that incorporates solar stills, reverse osmosis, and ultraviolet light to remove salt and impurities, making it safe for consumption. This will ensure a reliable source of clean drinking water.

Create a Shelter with Natural Materials: Use the island's abundant resources to build a shelter that is both functional and aesthetically pleasing. Utilize coconut fronds, palm leaves, and driftwood to construct a sturdy and weather-resistant structure. Add a thatched roof made from palm fronds to provide protection from the elements.

Develop a Signal Fire Communication System: Create a signal fire communication system that can be used to send messages to passing ships or planes. Use a series of strategically placed fires to spell out messages in Morse code or other visual signals. This will allow for communication with the outside world and increase the chances of rescue.

Build a Fish Farm: Utilize the island's abundant marine life to create a sustainable fish farm. Use a combination of nets, cages, and ponds to raise a variety of fish species, such as tilapia, sea bass, and shrimp. This will provide a reliable source of protein and help to supplement the survivor's diet.
